TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActiveDirectorySecurity extends System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity

summary.span: 使用 Managed ACL 程式庫的物件安全性階層以包裝目錄物件的存取控制功能。

span.span: Uses the object security layer of the managed ACL library to wrap access control functionality for directory objects.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ResetAccessRule (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule rule);
.method public hidebysig instance void ResetAccessRule(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule rule) cil managed
Public Sub ResetAccessRule (rule As ActiveDirectoryAccessRule)
public: void ResetAccessRule(System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectoryAccessRule ^ rule);

param.name: rule
param.span: 這個作業所套用到的 。

span.span: The object to which this operation applies.

summary.span: 搜尋包含安全識別項 (SID) 之所有存取規則的物件 DACL (這個安全識別項符合在 物件中所指定的 SID)，並以 物件中所包含的存取規則取代所有那些存取規則。

span.span: Searches an object's DACL for all access rules that contain a security identifier (SID) that matches the SID specified in the object, and replaces all of those access rules with the access rules that are contained in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當用來取代所有存取規則與特定的 SID 中物件的 DACL，這兩個允許和拒絕類型規則會被取代。When is used to replace all access rules with a particular SID in an object's DACL, both Allow- and Deny- type rules are replaced. 若要取代只允許規則，而不會影響 「 拒絕 」 規則，或取代 「 拒絕 」 規則，而不會影響允許規則，使用改為。To replace only Allow rules without affecting Deny rules, or to replace Deny rules without affecting Allow rules, use instead.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetAccessRule (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule rule);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetAccessRule(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule rule) cil managed
Public Sub SetAccessRule (rule As ActiveDirectoryAccessRule)
public: void SetAccessRule(System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectoryAccessRule ^ rule);

param.name: rule
param.span: 這個作業所套用到的 。

span.span: The object to which this operation applies.

summary.span: 搜尋所有存取規則之物件的 DACL，這些存取規則包含符合 物件中所指定之 SID 的安全識別項 (SID) 和符合 物件中所指定之型別的存取控制型別 (「允許」或「拒絕」)，並以 物件中包含的存取規則取代所有那些存取規則。

span.span: Searches an object's DACL for all access rules that contain a security identifier (SID) that matches the SID specified in the object, and an access control type (Allow or Deny) that matches the type specified in the object, and replaces all of those access rules with the access rules that are contained in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當用來取代的符合特定的 SID 與存取控制類型 （允許或拒絕） 中物件的 DACL，所有規則，因為具有相符 SID 和存取 SID 和類型的 DACL 控制項類型中所包含的所有存取規則`rule`物件 are 取代。When is used to replace all access rules that match a particular SID and access control type (Allow or Deny) in an object's DACL, all rules in that DACL with an SID and type that match the SID and access control type contained in the `rule` object are replaced. 使用此方法，開發人員可以針對該物件的 SID 取代任何允許規則，而不會影響現有的拒絕規則，或該物件的 SID 取代所有的拒絕規則而不會影響現有的允許規則。Using this method, the developer can replace any Allow rules for that SID on that object without affecting existing Deny rules, or replace all Deny rules for that SID on that object without affecting existing Allow rules. 若要取代所有的規則，該物件屬於指定的 SID，不論類型為何，使用改為。To replace all rules for that object pertaining to the specified SID, regardless of type, use instead.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetAuditRule (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAuditRule rule);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetAuditRule(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAuditRule rule) cil managed
Public Sub SetAuditRule (rule As ActiveDirectoryAuditRule)
public: void SetAuditRule(System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectoryAuditRule ^ rule);

param.name: rule
param.span: 這個作業所套用到的 。

span.span: The object to which this operation applies.

summary.span: 以指定的稽核規則，取代含有與物件的 SACL 中所指定之稽核規則相同安全識別項的所有稽核規則。

span.span: Replaces all audit rules that contain the same security identifier as the specified audit rule in the SACL of an object with the specified audit rule.
